PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_TankTypeCommon
PropertySetDef.Definition: Common attributes of a tank type.

PropertyDef.Name: Reference
PropertyDef.Definition: Reference ID for this specified type in this project (e.g. type 'A-1'), Also referred to as "construction type". It should be provided as an alternative to the name of the "object type", if the software does not support object types.

PropertyDef.Name: Status
PropertyDef.Definition: Status of the element, predominately used in renovation or retrofitting projects. The status can be assigned to as "New" - element designed as new addition, "Existing" - element exists and remains, "Demolish" - element existed but is to be demolished, "Temporary" - element will exists only temporary (like a temporary support structure).

PropertyDef.Name: AccessType
PropertyDef.Definition:
Defines the types of access (or cover) to a tank that may be specified.
Note that covers are generally specified for rectangular tanks. For cylindrical tanks, access will normally be via a manhole.

PropertyDef.Name: StorageType
PropertyDef.Definition: Defines the general material category intended to be stored.

PropertyDef.Name: NominalLengthOrDiameter
PropertyDef.Definition: The nominal length or, in the case of a vertical cylindrical tank, the nominal diameter of the tank.

PropertyDef.Name: NominalWidthOrDiameter
PropertyDef.Definition:
The nominal width or, in the case of a horizontal cylindrical tank, the nominal diameter of the tank.
Note: Not required for a vertical cylindrical tank.

PropertyDef.Name: NominalDepth
PropertyDef.Definition: Nominal or quoted depth of the object measured from the inlet drain connection to the base of the unit.

PropertyDef.Name: NominalCapacity
PropertyDef.Definition: Nominal cooling tower capacity in terms of heat transfer rate of the cooling tower between air stream and water stream at nominal conditions.

PropertyDef.Name: EffectiveCapacity
PropertyDef.Definition: The total effective or actual volumetric capacity of the tank.

PropertyDef.Name: OperatingWeight
PropertyDef.Definition: Operating weight of the tank including all of its contents.

PropertyDef.Name: PatternType
PropertyDef.Definition: Defines the types of pattern (or shape of a tank that may be specified.

PropertyDef.Name: EndShapeType
PropertyDef.Definition: Defines the types of end shapes that can be used for preformed tanks. The convention for reading these enumerated values is that for a vertical cylinder, the first value is the base and the second is the top; for a horizontal cylinder, the order of reading should be left to right. For a speherical tank, the value UNSET should be used.

PropertyDef.Name: FirstCurvatureRadius
PropertyDef.Definition: FirstCurvatureRadius should be defined as the base or left side radius of curvature value.

PropertyDef.Name: SecondCurvatureRadius
PropertyDef.Definition: SecondCurvatureRadius should be defined as the top or right side radius of curvature value.

PropertyDef.Name: NumberOfSections
PropertyDef.Definition:
Number of sections used in the construction of the tank. Default is 1.
Note: All sections assumed to be the same size.
